original_title: Greta Garbo: The Temptress and the Clown
overview: Two part biography of Greta Garbo - 1. The Temptress 2. The Clown. Reminiscences of her early life in Stockholm, with excerpts from her films. Narrated by Bibi Andersson.
tagline: Two part biography of Greta Garbo.
title: Greta Garbo: The Temptress and the Clown
